title: Feeling Angry on the Road? Here’s Why
sub_head: When our fuses are already short, driving can push us over the edge
body:
I was stopped at a red light recently—singing along to the radio—when I felt a tremendous jolt. The SUV behind me had slammed into my car.
When I stepped out to talk to the driver, he stomped right past me to the pickup truck in front of me. Two women jumped out of the truck. And then all three started screaming obscenities at each other.
